name: Ext_R3_ExplanationOfBenefit_totalBenefit
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ExplanationOfBenefit.totalBenefit for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ExplanationOfBenefit.totalBenefit from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ExplanationOfBenefit|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Total benefit payable for the Claim
element.definition: Total amount of benefit payable (Equal to sum of the Benefit amounts from all detail lines and additions less the Unallocated Deductable).
element.comment: `ExplanationOfBenefit.totalBenefit` maps to R4 `ExplanationOfBenefit.total.amount`.  So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
